quote: including three state-owned firms: Ucell, UMS (Mobiuz), and UzMobile
addition_information: UMS (Universal Mobile Services), was controlled by Russian telecom giant Mobile TeleSystems OJSC (MTS) until August 2016, when it sold that share to the Uzbek government (https://freedomhouse.org/sites/default/files/FOTN%202017_Uzbekistan.pdf)
